graph_title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species

page_content:
Non-statistical indicator

We have identified the following to be relevant to this indicator - An invasive alien species strategy for Canada

.

fr.graph_title: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
fr.indicator_name: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
fr.page_content:
Indicateur non statistique

Nous avons identifié les éléments suivants comme étant pertinents pour cet indicateur - Une stratégie sur les espèces exotiques envahissantes pour le Canada

.

SDG_GOAL: Goal 15: Protect, restore and promote sustainable use of terrestrial ecosystems, sustainably manage forests, combat desertification, and halt and reverse land degradation and halt biodiversity loss
SDG_TARGET: Target 15.8: By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
SDG_INDICATOR: Indicator 15.8.1: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
STAT_CONC_DEF: This indicator aims to quantify trends in:
